name: Local LLM API
description: A FastAPI service that provides text generation capabilities using various open-source language models

/.description: Get the service status, current model information, and list of available models

/generate.description: Generate text using the currently loaded model

request_body.prompt: string (required) - The input text to generate from
request_body.max_length: integer (optional) - Maximum length of generated text (default: 100)

response.processing_time: float - Time taken to generate the text in seconds
response.model_used: string - Name of the model used

/documentation.description: Get the API documentation in JSON format

/models.description: Get a list of available models and their descriptions
/models.response: Object mapping model names to their descriptions

tinyllama.name: TinyLlama/TinyLlama-1.1B-Chat-v1.0
tinyllama.description: A 1.1B parameter language model fine-tuned for chat
